author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: towards bug #34: to fully support int with @Optional (which we interpret as should be defaulted to 0), have
re-introduced PrimitiveXxxAdapters which can never be cleared (ie !isEmpty() at all times).

author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: towards bug #34: now defaults the values for Integer/int with and without @Optional.

author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: towards bug #34: added NakedObjectSpecification#getDefaultValue() - see previous commit.  These are the implementations classes being updated.  PrimitiveSpecification is the interesting one here.
